location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to James Farish, Acting Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the negotiation of a loan receipt at Bushire with Fatima Khanum, widow of the late Mahomed Ali Khaun [Muḥammad ‘Alī Khān]; it notes that the Resident intends to negotiate this in a personal capacity. The details of the negotiable amount are detailed at the end of the letter.
